name: Learning Tracks
description: Learn through a comprehensive series of topics, lessons, and projects. The curriculum is well-designed even beginners who never learn about software development can understand.

name: Portfolio Projects
description: Build and showcase your projects to display your skill and knowledge. Share them as your proof of knowledge and skills. Attract employers or clients with your remarkable portfolio.

name: Private Mentorship
description: Learn better and faster with an experienced private mentor. Accelerate your learning progress with a customized schedule, lessons, and difficulty level. All learning experience can be designed to fit your needs and preferences.

name: Community Forum
description: Connect with the global community in Catamyst. Discuss a wide range of interesting topics. It is a safe and clean place for everyone to ask and answer questions. Where you can resolve both technical and non-technical issues.

name: Members Collaboration
description: Find learning and working teammates from the community. Build and showcase your projects as a team. Mentors can also guide on how you can work together.

name: Work Opportunities
description: Discover numerous work opportunities around the world with your established skills and experience after the learning. Find the meaningful job you love.
